name: Lambda throttling - {{functionname.name}} throttled {{value}} times -- DD Example
message:
Function {{functionname.name}} has been throttled {{value}} times over the last 15 mins. 
Please investigate - see the function in [Datadog Serverless](https://app.datadoghq.com/functions?search=%7B%22functionname%22%3A%7B%22type%22%3A%22included%22%2C%22list%22%3A%5B%22{{functionname.name}}%22%5D%7D%7D). 

For changes to the function see [AWS console](https://{{region.name}}.console.aws.amazon.com/lambda/home?region={{region.name}}#/functions

See this guide for help with [troubleshooting Lambda throttling](https://aws.amazon.com/premiumsupport/knowledge-center/lambda-troubleshoot-throttling/)
